column5: I mentioned in my last Quinte Thread - my friend Bill nailed a 15.5 beauty on the Bay of Quinte.Here is the Video of that remarkable day - Enjoy!http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4RxIh...layer_embeddedNote: Bill is part of Anglersthree along with Allan - Great people who love fishing. Pretty decent Video production to.Merry Christmas to all on the Forum and a very Happy and Productive New Year!bobby
What a trophy, wonder how many inches. Had some serious shoulders on it!
Nice video and a great fish! But, I have to tell you those clickers are like nails on a chalkboard to me. lol Juls
